uuid.description: Unique identifier in UUID v4 format

resourceUrl.description: A descriptive info about a link to a resource.

title.description: Brief resource description, for example, an article header.

categoryUrl.description: Link to a category that located in a separate json file.

rootCategoryId.description: CategoryId that identifies a json file where a target category can be found. If this not set then target category is the root category.
